trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> control.
Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner"></xref>.
Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner.Configure"></xref> method can be called by the design host.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner.Configure"></xref> method can be called; otherwise, `false`.
Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema(System.Boolean)"></xref> method can be called by the design host.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema(System.Boolean)"></xref> method can be called; otherwise, `false`.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.CommandText"></xref> property of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> control.
The value of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.CommandText"></xref> property.
Launches the data source configuration utility in the design host.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.ConnectionString"></xref> property of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> control.
The value of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.ConnectionString"></xref> property.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.DefaultContainerName"></xref> property of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> control.
The value of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.DefaultContainerName"></xref> property.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EntitySetName"></xref> property of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> control.
The value of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EntitySetName"></xref> property.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EntityTypeFilter"></xref> property of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> control.
The value of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EntityTypeFilter"></xref> property.
Returns a data source view that has the specified name.
The name of the view to return.
A object with the name specified by viewName.
Gets a list of available views.
A collection with one element that contains the name "DefaultView".
Initializes the control designer and loads the specified component.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> object to initialize.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderBy"></xref> property of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> control.
The value of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderBy"></xref> property.
Used by the designer to add properties or remove properties in the properties grid, or to shadow properties of the associated control.
This member overrides <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
The properties to be filtered.
Refreshes the schema from the underlying data source.
`true` to suppress all data source events until the schema is refreshed.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Select"></xref> property of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> control.
The value of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Select"></xref> property.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Where"></xref> property of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> control.
The value of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Where"></xref> property.
